main.name: Taylor Dragoo
main.description: With a passion for web applications, UX and sound design
main.bio: Experienced Leader with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology industry. Skilled in solving problems with HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, SQL, and .NET! I am focused on adding value to any team I am on and believe we all rise together working as a team. If a portion of the team needs help with a task, I do not hesitate to assist. I am also an avid sound designer, game developer, and participant in the overall game dev community having participated in multiple game jams as a sound designer and lead programmer.
main.bio2: I took the knowledge gained from being a sound editor and decided to pursue a second Bachelorâ€™s degree, After looking at different programs, I began the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science program online at Fort Hays State University.
main.bio3: Prior to starting my Computer Science degree I had begun my career as an IT Support Analyst at the University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center which is where I still currently reside.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Applied Technology in Sound Design

work.title: University of Oklahoma
work.description1: Collaborated with strategist and end-user to define and develop new application concepts to be used by the College of Medicine at the Health Sciences Center.
work.description2: Drove continual improvement to system architecture by refactoring old legacy code that had been written in ColdFusion 11 to Laravel.
work.description3: Provide feedback to the development group to improve agile project management methods.

work.title: University of Oklahoma
work.description1: Provide a positive customer-focused service in a high-volume environment while meeting service level agreement standards.
work.description2: Led the team in calls and ticket resolutions over the course of 2020, as we experienced a 40% increase in desktop support tickets from the year prior.
work.description4: Technology Used: Active Directory, Exchange Management Console, Dell Encryption Enterprise, PowerShell, VMWare.
work.description3: Managed user accounts and access in Microsoft Active Directory, Exchange Management Console and Office365 Cloud Exchange Management Console.

work.title: Audio Post-Production Engineering and Consultation
work.description1: Audio Post-Production Engineer and consultant primarily focused on Film, Television and Interactive media.
work.description2: Major projects involve feature-length films that went on to be showcased on Netflix, Comic-Con International, and Theatres throughout the country
work.description3: Execute in a fast-paced, highly fluid environment and collaborate with teams in other offices
work.description4: Technology: Avid Pro Tools, Ableton, Soundminer, Universal Audio, SoundToys

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
